<!-- Parent: ../AGENTS.md -->
# .github

## Purpose

GitHub-specific configuration and automation files for the DotnetDevKR.TailwindCSS repository.

## Key Files

None at this level.

## Subdirectories

- `workflows/` - GitHub Actions CI/CD workflows (see [workflows/AGENTS.md](workflows/AGENTS.md))

## For AI Agents

This directory follows standard GitHub repository conventions. The main automation logic resides in the `workflows/` subdirectory.

## Dependencies

- GitHub Actions runner environment
- GitHub Packages and NuGet.org publishing secrets
